theFleshweaver:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theFleshweaver:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theFleshweaver:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theFleshweaver:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theFleshweaver:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theFleshweaver:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theFleshweaver:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theFleshweaver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theFleshweaver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theFleshweaver:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theFleshweaver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theFleshweaver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theFleshweaver:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
